Sentence.sentence: While bullying is parents' greatest concern over all, nearly half of low-income parents worry their child will get shot, compared with one-fifth of high-income parents.
They are more likely to grow up in neighborhoods that their parents say aren't great for raising children, and their parents worry about them getting shot, beaten up or in trouble with the law.
The embargo (禁运) created panic in the West and caused oil prices to shoot up.
The experiment is based upon the idea that farmers who're protecting their herd from lions would shoot and kill lions in an effort to protect their livestock.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含有"枝"之意。
means: branch ： 普通用词，泛指树木比bough小一些的大枝或小枝，也可用于引申意义。
bough ： 指主枝或粗大强壮的枝。
shoot ： 指植物或灌木刚长出的新枝、嫩枝或嫩芽。

example.en: Stop shooting your mouth off. Nobody believes you any more.
example.zh: 别再瞎吹了。没人再相信你了。

means.word_mean: 开枪, 射击; 射中, 射死

sentences.en: He shoots well.
sentences.cn: 他枪打得好。

sentences.en: Our striker got into a good position to shoot, but then missed his kick.
sentences.cn: 我们的前锋取得一个有利的位置射门, 可惜没有射中。

sentences.en: The film was shooting.
sentences.cn: 这部影片正在拍摄中。

sentences.en: The boat shot the rapids.
sentences.cn: 小船迅速通过急流。

sentence.cn: 雪莉·安的几个朋友和家人被卷入了这起谋杀案；她的一个堂兄弟被枪杀，案发地点离她住的地方只有几条街远。
sentence.en: Several of Shelly-Ann's friends and family were caught up in the killings; one of her cousins was shot dead only a few streets away from where she lived.
sentence.from: 2016年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

mean.mean: 开（枪或其他武器）；射击；发射

sentence.cn: 美国最后一只确认的野鸽是1900年在俄亥俄州派克县被一名男孩射杀的。
sentence.en: The last confirmed wild pigeon in the United States was shot by a boy in Pike County, Ohio, in 1900.
sentence.from: 2014年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

jx.jx_cn_mean: 见 bolt

jx.jx_en_mean: (N. Amer. informal)have a casual conversation
jx.jx_cn_mean: (北美，非正式)闲扯

jx.jx_en_mean: pull one's shirt cuffs out to project beyond the cuffs of one's jacket or coat
jx.jx_cn_mean: （从夹克或大衣的袖口里）拉出衬衣的袖口

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)react suddenly or without careful consideration of one's words or actions
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)信口开河；鲁莽行事

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)inadvertently make a situation worse for oneself
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)对自己不利，砸自己的锅

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)(非正式)engage in a decisive confrontation, typically a gun battle

jx.jx_en_mean: (Brit. informal)describe something in an exaggerated, untruthful, or boastful way

lj.lj_ly: he never shot a line about his escapades.
lj.lj_ls: 关于他的那些恶作剧，他始终闭口不谈。

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)talk boastfully or indiscreetly
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)胡吹，随便乱说

jx.jx_en_mean: kill or wound someone by shooting them, especially in a ruthless way
jx.jx_cn_mean: （尤指无情地）击毙；击伤

lj.lj_ls: 军队无情地击毙了28名示威者。

jx.jx_en_mean: (Austral./NZ informal)leave, typically to escape from or avoid someone or something

lj.lj_ly: me wife's shot through and I can't pay the rent.
lj.lj_ls: 我老婆跑走了，我付不起房租。

jx.jx_en_mean: cause great damage to something by shooting; kill or wound someone by shooting
jx.jx_cn_mean: （通过射击）摧毁；击毙；击伤

lj.lj_ly: the police shot up our building.
lj.lj_ls: 警察击毁了我们的大楼。

jx.jx_en_mean: (亦作 shoot up)(informal)inject a narcotic drug; inject someone with a narcotic drug
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)注射毒品；向…注射毒品

lj.lj_ly: she went home and shot up alone in her room.
lj.lj_ls: 她回到家，一个人在房里注射毒品。
当时我正在注射可卡因。

lj.lj_ly: shoot people up with the new chemical and see what happens.
lj.lj_ls: 给人注射新的化学药品，看看情况怎样。

jx.jx_cn_mean: 击落：用炮火或导弹打击或损坏的方式打落（比如飞机）

jx.jx_en_mean: &I{Informal} To ruin the aspirations of; disappoint.

jx.jx_en_mean: &I{Informal}
jx.jx_cn_mean: 批驳：指出…为假；证明…是假的

phrase.cizu_name: shoot for  或 shoot at 【非正式用语】

jx.jx_en_mean: To strive or aim for; have as a goal.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 争取得到或追求…；以…为目标

jx.jx_en_mean: &I{Informal} To grow or get taller rapidly.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 【非正式用语】 迅速生长或长高

jx.jx_cn_mean: 激增：在数量上急剧增长

jx.jx_cn_mean: 射击：用子弹把…打得到处是孔

jx.jx_cn_mean: 乱一开枪：用密集或零星的炮火破坏或威吓（比如一个小镇）

jx.jx_en_mean: &I{Slang} To inject a drug with a hypodermic syringe.
jx.jx_cn_mean: &I{【俚语】} 用静脉注射管注静毒品

entry.def: If someone shoots a person or an animal, they kill them or injure them by firing a bullet or arrow at them.

example.ex: The police had orders to shoot anyone who attacked them...
example.tran: 警察接到命令可以枪击任何攻击他们的人。

example.ex: Namibian law permits ranchers to shoot cheetahs to protect their livestock...
example.tran: 纳米比亚法律允许农场主射杀猎豹以保护家畜。

entry.def: To shoot means to fire a bullet from a weapon such as a gun.

example.ex: He taunted armed officers by pointing to his head, as if inviting them to shoot...
example.tran: 他用手指着自己的头来嘲弄武装警察，好像在招引他们开枪一样。

example.ex: The police came around the corner and they started shooting at us...
example.tran: 警察拐过了街角，开始朝我们开枪。

entry.def: If someone or something shoots in a particular direction, they move in that direction quickly and suddenly.

example.ex: They had almost reached the boat when a figure shot past them...
example.tran: 他们差不多快到船边时，一个人影从他们旁边飞奔而过。

example.ex: Another car shot out of a junction and smashed into the back of them.
example.tran: 另一辆车从交叉路口飞驰而出，撞到了他们汽车的尾部。

entry.def: If you shoot something somewhere or if it shoots somewhere, it moves there quickly and suddenly.
entry.tran: (突然并迅速地)伸出，扔出，抛出

example.ex: Masters shot a hand across the table and gripped his wrist...
example.tran: 马斯特斯迅速把手伸到桌对面，紧紧抓住他的手腕。

example.ex: As soon as she got close, the old woman's hand shot out...
example.tran: 她一靠近，那老妇人的手就猛地伸了出来。

entry.def: If you shoot a look at someone, you look at them quickly and briefly, often in a way that expresses your feelings.

example.ex: Mary Ann shot him a rueful look...
example.tran: 玛丽·安懊悔地瞥了他一眼。

example.ex: The man in the black overcoat shot a penetrating look at the other man.
example.tran: 身穿黑大衣的男子目光犀利地扫了另外一名男子一眼。

entry.def: If someone shoots to fame, they become famous or successful very quickly.

example.ex: Alina Reyes shot to fame a few years ago with her extraordinary first novel...
example.tran: 阿林娜·雷耶斯几年前因她那部不同凡响的小说处女作而迅速成名。

example.ex: She shot to stardom on Broadway in a Noel Coward play.
example.tran: 她因在百老汇出演了一部诺埃尔·科沃德的戏一炮而红。

entry.def: When people shoot a film or shoot photographs, they make a film or take photographs using a camera.

example.ex: He'd love to shoot his film in Cuba...
example.tran: 他很乐意在古巴拍摄他的影片。

example.ex: Three CBS cameramen were on site to shoot and edit taped reports. 3
example.tran: 名哥伦比亚广播公司的摄影记者在现场拍摄并编辑录像报道。

entry.def: Shoots are plants that are beginning to grow, or new parts growing from a plant or tree.
In sports such as football or basketball, when someone shoots, they try to score by kicking, throwing, or hitting the ball towards the goal.

example.ex: Spencer scuttled away from Young to shoot wide when he should have scored...
example.tran: 斯潘塞绕开了扬却把球射偏了，他本该进球得分的。

example.ex: A time limit was set for a team to shoot at the basket.
example.tran: 球队在规定时间内必须要投篮。

entry.def: When someone shoots pool or shoots craps, they play a game of pool or the dice game called craps.

example.ex: People are still hanging out drinking beer, maybe shooting some pool.
example.tran: 人们仍聚在那里喝啤酒，可能还会打会儿台球。

entry.def: If you shoot the breeze or shoot the bull with someone, you talk to them about things which are not very serious or important.

example.ex: They expected me to sit up and shoot the breeze with them till one or two in the morning...
example.tran: 他们希望我晚上熬夜陪他们聊天到凌晨一两点。

example.ex: I also met with Pollack again to kind of shoot the bull.
example.tran: 我也再次和波拉克会面，两人闲聊了会儿。

entry.def: If you shoot yourself in the foot, something you say or do causes you harm.
entry.tran: 搬起石头砸自己的脚;自作自受

example.ex: If I was to insult the contestants I would be shooting myself in the foot.
example.tran: 如果我羞辱参赛者，就会搬起石头砸自己的脚。

means.word_mean: 2. the act of shooting at targets;

sentences.sentence: "they hold a shoot every weekend during the summer"

means.word_mean: 1. hit with a missile from a weapon
4. make a film or photograph of something;
6. run or move very quickly or hastily;
8. throw or propel in a specific direction or towards a specific objective;

sentences.sentence: "I photographed the scene of the accident"
"She snapped a picture of the President"

means.word_mean: 10. emit (as light, flame, or fumes) suddenly and forcefully;

sentences.sentence: "The dragon shot fumes and flames out of its mouth"

means.word_mean: 11. cause a sharp and sudden pain in;
12. force or drive (a fluid or gas) into by piercing;
13. variegate by interweaving weft threads of different colors;
14. throw dice, as in a crap game
18. measure the altitude of by using a sextant;

sentences.sentence: "We injected the glucose into the patient's vein"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English scēotan, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch scieten and German sciessen, also to sheet, shot, and shut

sentences.cn: 所有动作场景全都由手持摄影机拍摄而成.
sentences.en: All of the action scenes were shot using hand held cameras.

sentences.cn: 这一女子就成了陈家刚拍摄这些图片时观念的 “ 化身 ”.
sentences.en: The girl became the " embodiment " of his concept when he shot the pictures.

sentences.cn: 位于都灵, 意大利拍摄的大马德雷迪迪奥.
sentences.en: A shot of Grande Madre di Dio in Torino, Italy.

sentences.cn: 然而, 拍摄的单一性却在于摄影机替代了公众.
sentences.en: However, the singularity of the shot studio is that camera is substituted for the public.

sentences.cn: 我在明尼苏达动物园拍摄了这张映出火烈鸟侧面倒影的照片.
sentences.en: I took this shot of a silhouetted flamingo's reflection at the Minnesota Zoo.

sentences.cn: 拍摄范围包括创意摄影 、 商业摄影 、 婚纱摄影 、 个人影象 、 艺术影象等.
sentences.en: Shooting range, including creative photography, commercial photography, wedding photography, personal images, art and other images.

sentences.cn: 为了影片的拍摄成功, 万氏兄弟做了大量的案头工作.
sentences.en: Film shooting in order to succeed, Wan brothers have done a lot of desk work.

sentences.cn: 这样拍摄效果会很模糊, 你应该先对焦.
sentences.en: To shoot this way won't do. You need to focus first.

sentences.cn: 只有一个拍摄一边显示为固体.
sentences.en: Only side of the shoot is shown as a solid.

sentences.cn: 不过, 更多的人认为这只是因拍摄角度不同而形成的错觉.
sentences.en: However, more people believed it was just an illusion caused by the shooting angle.

sentences.cn: 当然在拍成动画片之前我们先进行了 真人 拍摄.
sentences.en: We shot it live action though [ before it was animated ].

sentences.cn: 我们在英国银行的门前拍摄.
sentences.en: We shot in front of the Bank of England.

sentences.cn: 跟宋承宪的拍摄怎样?
sentences.en: How did the shooting go with SSH?

sentences.cn: 我们一到台北,立即赶去拍摄杂志封面照.
sentences.en: So we arrived in Taipei and shuttled to a shoot for a magazine cover.

sentences.cn: 尽管这样, 他还是觉得拍摄中难度最大的还是打戏.
sentences.en: Despite this, that he was shot the most difficult to play or opera.

sentences.cn: 简单的图片像这样经常沟通,这么多的地方,将作为一个广泛的拍摄.
sentences.en: Simple images as this often communicate as much a place as a wide shot would.

sentences.cn: 假设你想要在白天拍摄一张户外人像的照片.
sentences.en: Suppose you want to shoot a portrait outdoors in the daytime.

sentences.cn: 吻合光照的最佳建议是仔细观察和在拍摄时纪录笔记.
sentences.en: The best advice to matching lighting is good observation and note taking during the shoot.

sentences.cn: 拍摄的很多人都不看好它.
sentences.en: Most people on the shoot thought that it wasn't going to work.

sentences.cn: 该摄影师选择快速镜头拍摄.
sentences.en: The photographer chose a fast lens for the shoot.

sentences.cn: 起初的女孩,已经在淋浴在一起, 每个相机拍摄的其他乐趣.
sentences.en: At first hot girls have fun in the shower together, shooting each other on camera.

sentences.cn: 我隔着苇草拍摄, 形成一个富有吸引力的边框.
sentences.en: I also shot through some reeds, which gives it an attractive frame.

sentences.cn: 属都湖是中央电视台《文成公主》的拍摄外景地.
sentences.en: It is the shooting location of Princess Wen Cheng made by Central Television.

sentences.cn: 当拍摄全景照片的时候,进行更多的重叠拍摄. 你最好能在两张照片之间拍摄50%的重叠部分.
sentences.en: Lots of overlap when shooting panoramas. You should try for 50 % overlap on average between photos.

sentences.cn: 摄影师维吉以拍摄30年代纽约罪案的骇人照片而声名鹊起。
sentences.en: Photographer Weegee shot to fame with his shocking pics of New York crime in the 30s.

sentences.cn: 安东尼拿着照相机下了车，走向离城墙更远的地方，为拍摄构图。
sentences.en: Anthony dismounted with his camera and walked away from the walls to compose a shot.

sentences.cn: 《马耳他之鹰》的拍摄进展顺利。
sentences.en: The shooting of The Maltese Falcon proceeded without a hitch.
